title: The Thirty-Nine Steps
description: This is an alternate cover edition - ISBN 10: 1853260800.Richard Hannayâ€™s boredom with London society is soon relieved when the resourceful engineer from South Africa is caught up in a web of secret codes, spies, and murder on the eve of WWI. When a neighbour is killed in his flat, Richard, suspected, decodes the journal, runs to the wilds of his native Scotland in disguises and local dialects, evades Germans and officials.
author: John Buchan
